title: MAGISTRATE DECIDES TO SELL SAKVITHI’S PRINTING EQUIPMENT
content: December 07, 2010: Twenty-one suspects, including Sakvithi Ranasinghe, the chief suspect in the financial scam amounting to more than a billion rupees, were produced before the Gangodawila magistrate’s court yet again yesterday. For the first time, a state counsel appeared on behalf of the prosecution yesterday….
